{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":2988459,"name":"Sam Geckler","username":"sgeckler","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/sgeckler/{size}/66162_2.png","created_at":"2022-01-10T20:06:58.489Z","cooked":"

Just what it says. Power cells happily went under our bumpers as did Deep Space Cargo with just a little lift assist by another robot.

Has anyone tried to drive over Rapid React CARGO?

It’s safe to say you aren’t driving over cargo unless you catch some air.

Power cells happily went under and stuck there, leaving unhappy bots…
I asked the kids about this, initial playing around was no-ish.

","post_number":3,"post_type":1,"posts_count":10,"updated_at":"2022-01-10T20:12:57.097Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":0,"reads":334,"readers_count":333,"score":66.8,"yours":false,"topic_id":399507,"topic_slug":"can-you-drive-over-rapid-react-cargo","display_username":"Rod","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":46443,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"Mentor"},"post_url":"/t/can-you-drive-over-rapid-react-cargo/399507/3","custom_user_title":"Mentor","reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":2988474,"name":"Roger","username":"Roger","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/r/c0e974/{size}.png","created_at":"2022-01-10T20:29:03.603Z","cooked":"

Those Power Cells were soft and squishy and easily got pulled under robots, and chewed.
This year’s Cargo are more of a rock, and bigger in diameter, so a little more difficult. But I won’t say never…

","post_number":4,"post_type":1,"posts_count":10,"updated_at":"2022-01-10T20:29:03.603Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":0,"reads":281,"readers_count":280,"score":71.2,"yours":false,"topic_id":399507,"topic_slug":"can-you-drive-over-rapid-react-cargo","display_username":"Roger","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":1}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":5699,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":""},"post_url":"/t/can-you-drive-over-rapid-react-cargo/399507/4","custom_user_title":null,"reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":1}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":1,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":2988479,"name":"Smtopps","username":"Smtopps","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/smtopps/{size}/166758_2.png","created_at":"2022-01-10T20:34:23.602Z","cooked":"

Another note is the power cells are sticky which causes them to get stuck to the bumpers and sucked under while you drive over them. This years object has a much less grippy surface which means it’s more likely to roll off and away from the bumpers.

This will be a good year to keep bumpers low to the carpet.

","post_number":6,"post_type":1,"posts_count":10,"updated_at":"2022-01-10T20:37:24.260Z","reply_count":1,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":0,"reads":235,"readers_count":234,"score":82.0,"yours":false,"topic_id":399507,"topic_slug":"can-you-drive-over-rapid-react-cargo","display_username":"Richard Wallace","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":2}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":1549,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"I live for the details."},"post_url":"/t/can-you-drive-over-rapid-react-cargo/399507/6","custom_user_title":"I live for the details.","reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":2}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":2,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":2988483,"name":"OccamzRazor","username":"OccamzRazor","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/occamzrazor/{size}/4047_2.png","created_at":"2022-01-10T20:37:52.626Z","cooked":"

We tried with a few different bumper heights and we couldn’t get on top of one. The game piece is not easily compressible like the 2020 lemons that just wanted to belong in places you didn’t want them to.

","post_number":7,"post_type":1,"posts_count":10,"updated_at":"2022-01-10T20:37:52.626Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":0,"reads":226,"readers_count":225,"score":90.2,"yours":false,"topic_id":399507,"topic_slug":"can-you-drive-over-rapid-react-cargo","display_username":"OccamzRazor","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":3}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":11695,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"post_url":"/t/can-you-drive-over-rapid-react-cargo/399507/7","custom_user_title":null,"reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":3}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":3,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":2988492,"name":"Rick Lance","username":"rlance","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/rlance/{size}/8537_2.png","created_at":"2022-01-10T20:45:08.500Z","cooked":"

But not so low that the 7/8" cable guard bump could cause an issue. It would be embarrassing to somehow high center on that.

","post_number":8,"post_type":1,"posts_count":10,"updated_at":"2022-01-10T20:45:08.500Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":6,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":0,"reads":205,"readers_count":204,"score":71.0,"yours":false,"topic_id":399507,"topic_slug":"can-you-drive-over-rapid-react-cargo","display_username":"Rick Lance","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","reply_to_user":{"id":1549,"username":"Richard_Wallace","name":"Richard Wallace","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/richard_wallace/{size}/110760_2.png"},"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":2}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":26112,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"post_url":"/t/can-you-drive-over-rapid-react-cargo/399507/8","custom_user_title":null,"reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":2}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":2,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":2988514,"name":"Travis Hoffman","username":"Travis_Hoffman","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/travis_hoffman/{size}/161072_2.png","created_at":"2022-01-10T21:01:24.793Z","cooked":"

Speaking of Deep Space cargo:

Compressible things can wreak havoc when your robot compresses them against something rigid.

Which reminds me…

Now in the videos above, replace the game pieces with the 2022 cargo. Ponder on whether it can generate the same results given the same actions. Or even better, try it with some poor unfortunate test robot.
